name: Image Generation
description: Generate images using OpenAI's DALL-E API. Requires OpenAI API key. Images are saved to the workspace.
author: PalmClaw Team

tools.name: generate_image
tools.description: Generate an image from a text prompt using OpenAI's image generation API (DALL-E). The generated image is saved to the workspace images directory and the file path is returned.

prompt.description: A detailed text description of the image to generate

model.description: Model to use: dall-e-3 (default) or dall-e-2

style.description: Image style: vivid (default) or natural. Only for dall-e-3.
